alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 12:33AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Otero, southwestern Kiowa, northeastern Crowley and northwestern Bent Counties through 100 AM MDT... At 1233 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Arlington, or 24 miles north of North La Junta, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Blue Lake around 1245 AM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM MDT for southeastern Colorado.
